HomePage.title: Welcome to FTES
HomePage.about: FTES is a platform that helps you manage your business effectively
HomePage.subtitle: First Technology Education Services
HomePage.description: FTES (First Technology Education Services) is an intelligent learning system that applies artificial intelligence (AI) to provide personalized, modern, and effective learning experiences for everyone interested in information technology.

create_chatbot.title: Create Chatbot with AI
create_chatbot.description: Create intelligent chatbots with AI expert assistance, serving specific user needs.

ai_combat.title: AI Combat
ai_combat.description: Explore AI capabilities in dialogue and debate, helping to better understand AI technology.

api_integration.title: API Integration
api_integration.description: Export chatbot as API to integrate into other websites, serving developer needs.

manage.title: Manage Chatbot
manage.description: Easily manage and organize created chatbots, with the ability to edit and update information.

public.title: Public Chatbot
public.description: Share your chatbot with the community and receive user feedback.

conversation.title: Conversation Management
conversation.description: Track and manage conversations, analyze interactions and improve response quality.

history.title: Chat History
history.description: Store and retrieve chat history, helping to track progress and improve user experience.

cta.description: Discover AI tools specially designed for learning and skill development.

hero.title: FTES AI Platform
hero.subtitle: Revolutionize Your Development Workflow
hero.description: Advanced AI-powered tools for developers, educators, and content creators. From automated testing to intelligent grading, unleash the power of artificial intelligence.
hero.trustedBy: Trusted by developers and educators worldwide

features.title: Powerful AI Tools
features.subtitle: Everything you need to enhance your development and educational workflow

apiTesting.title: Smart API Testing
apiTesting.description: AI-powered REST API test case generation and validation. Automatically create comprehensive test suites with intelligent assertions.

codeGrader.title: Intelligent Code Grader
codeGrader.description: Advanced AI evaluation for code quality, structure, and best practices across multiple programming languages.

gradeAssignment.title: Assignment Grader
